DOC.brief_summary: According European Resuscitation Council ( ERC ) Guidelines patient depth approximately 5-6 cm firm flat surface possible . However , Cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) performer may need continue chest Resuscitation 2010 , CPR performer compress sternum compression oblique direction , elevator . For pregnant patient cardiac arrest , 2010 ERC Guidelines recommend performer place patient left-lateral tilt 15 - 30Â° use firm wedge support pelvis thorax pregnant uterus compress inferior vena cava . We hypothesize Smartphone base chest compression feedback app would improve quality CPR angulate surface .
DOC.brief_title: Tilt Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation With Feedback Device
DOC.criteria: Healthy person > 18 year old Basic life support educate person Cardiovascular disease Musculoskeletal disease Psychiatric disease Pregnant > 65 year old
